mapper.select: SELECT RV_WIRQCODE AS RVWIRQCODE, RV_WIHELPER AS RVHELPER, RV_STAR AS RVSTAR, RV_COMMENT AS RVCOMMENT FROM RV WHERE RV_WIHELPER = #{rvHelper} AND RV_WIRQCODE = #{rvWirqCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RV(RV_WIRQCODE, RV_WIHELPER, RV_STAR, RV_COMMENT) VALUES(#{rvWirqCode}, #{rvHelper}, #{rvStar}, #{rvComment})
